content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = '[ProductDesc]' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = '[ext]')
CREATE TABLE [ext].[ProductDesc]
	(
	 [ProductDescriptionID] int,
	 [Description] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_[ProductCat]
--AS
--BEGIN
INSERT INTO [ext].[ProductDesc]
(ProductDescriptionID, Description)
SELECT [ProductDescriptionID], [Description]
FROM [adventureworks_schema].[ProductDescription_Dim]
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [ext].[ProductDesc]
GO
